def solve(arr):
    #initialize sum variable
    total = 0
    
    #loop through all possible subarrays
    for i in range(len(arr)):
        for j in range(i, len(arr)):
            #calculate product of subarray
            prod = 1
            for k in range(i, j+1):
                prod *= arr[k]
            
            #add product to sum
            total += prod
    
    #return sum
    return total
